root.name: Intensity Projection
root.description: Intensity projection along depth or time with multiple algorithms: mean, max, median, variance, standard deviation, saturated sum. Projection can be restricted to ROI.
root.author: adufour - Alexandre Dufour
root.changelog:
- Version 1.5.3.0 Date 2016-12-11 15:56:56
Added static access to a method
- Version 1.5.2.0 Date 2016-03-24 15:34:18
Fixed an issue where the histogram bounds were not properly updated on the projected data
- Version 1.5.1.0 Date 2016-02-11 10:49:02
Added a stop button
- Version 1.5.0.1 Date 2016-01-12 16:15:39
Re-uploaded .jar file
- Version 1.5.0.0 Date 2015-12-14 11:58:21
* Drastically improved performance on single-channel single-time point data * Changed methods to static access (for simpler script access) * Fixed color map assignment
- Version 1.4.0.0 Date 2013-12-12 18:58:57
New: Minimum intensity projection
- Version 1.3.1.0 Date 2013-11-08 13:31:04
Fixed an issue in metadata creation
- Version 1.3.0.0 Date 2013-11-02 15:04:12
* Updated to Icy 1.4.0.0 * Metadata is now conserved in the projected data
- Version 1.2.1.0 Date 2013-08-20 15:53:56
Minor update: restriction to the sequence ROI is not applied if no ROI are present in the sequence.
- Version 1.2.0.0 Date 2013-08-20 15:43:40
New feature: projection can now be restricted to the sequence ROI
Many thanks to Davide Heller for the suggestion.
- Version 1.1.0.1 Date 2012-10-30 10:20:09
Fixed minimum required kernel version
- Version 1.1.0.0 Date 2012-10-30 09:33:06
New: block implementation for protocols
- Version 1.0.0.2 Date 2012-02-20 13:16:25
Updated to EzPlug 1.6.4.1
- Version 1.0.0.1 Date 2011-07-20 17:19:58
adjusted classpath
- Version 1.0.0.0 Date 2011-07-20 17:13:35
